text: Yuri Stepanovich Gryadunov (; 2 December 1929 – 8 May 2020) was a Soviet and Russian diplomat. He was Ambassador of Russia to Jordan from 1990 to 1992. He was born in Omsk Oblast. He was honored with the Order of the Badge of Honour, the Order of Friendship of Peoples, the Order of the Red Banner of Labour, and the Medal "For Labour Valour". He was a member of the Imperial Orthodox Palestine Society and of the Chamber of Commerce and Industry of the Russian Federation. Gryadunov died on 8 May 2020 in Moscow, aged 90.О кончине Ю.С.Грядунова ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Ambassadors of Russia Category:Soviet politicians Category:Russian politicians Category:People from Omsk Oblast
title: Yuri Gryadunov
